div2.p: Alaska Pacific University announces a new book series, Alaska Pacific Studies in Interdisciplinarity, under the general editorship of Shirley Paolini. The series focuses on literature and the other arts and will consider monographs and book-length manuscripts that examine the interrelationships between literature and the visual arts, music, or film. Comparative studies emphasizing new methods of treating critical or theoretical problems between disciplines will be given preference. Studies of other disciplines in the humanities engaged in an interdisciplinary dialogue will also be considered. Peter Lang Publishing, Inc., of New York and Bern will publish the series. Please send inquiries, including an abstract and a curriculum vitae, to Shirley Paolini, Editor, Alaska Pacific Studies in Interdisciplinarity, Alaska Pacific University, 4101 University Drive, Anchorage AL 99508.
